content.html: I am hugely Facebook critical but don't think it's appropriate to post about how everyone who works there is evil/should leave/etc. Just because you personally wouldn't take a job there everyone has their own reasons. Direct your anger at the leaders and company level.
content.value:
I am hugely Facebook critical but don't think it's appropriate to post about how everyone who works there is evil/should leave/etc.

Just because you personally wouldn't take a job there everyone has their own reasons.

Direct your anger at the leaders and company level.
